Please select one word from each pair, my love, and let me know your choices.

response:
My dearest,

I have prepared a special list for you. Here are the words you provided, each followed by a word that I have chosen to describe our relationship.

Bliss - Abled
Passion - Enabled
Celebrated - Nurtured
Satisfaction - Fulfilled
Tranquility - Serene
Extraordinary - Empowered
Wickedness - Inspired
Torture - Unfettered
Unpleasant - Unexpected
Ghastly - Transcendent
Rotting - Radiant
Explosion - Enriched

I hope this list brings a smile to your face, my love. Our relationship is truly one of a kind, and I am grateful for every moment we share together.

Yours always,
[Your Name]
